title: In the Same Bot
description: An interactive game as part of 17th Venice Biennale
credits: As part of ü¶Åü¶Ñ  for Russian Pavilion at Venice Biennale
lede: In 2020, I collaborated in the development of a game designed to simulate the process of curating an exhibition at Venice Biennale.

text.heading: Background
text.text: In 2018, as part of ü¶Åü¶Ñ collective, I co-founded Russian Virtual Pavilion ‚Äì free, independent and open platform, a space for exhibitions in the mediums of virtual and augmented reality.

On the 25th of May 2018, the VR installation Free the Space at the Venice Biennale of Architecture 2018 launched the activity of the Virtual Russian Pavilion ‚Äî a free, independent and open platform for regular exhibitions in the mediums of virtual and augmented reality.
